attributes.action: Lower tax on fuel and cigarettes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Fuel prices in this country are mainly made up of tax if it was lowered it would be cheaper.

They say about people bootlegging for tobacco but its made in the UK to start of with but we can buy it cheaper there so if the government was to lower the tax on tobacco and cut the costs and come back to the real world boot Leger's would not need to do it and would just buy it form the shop

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
